74087f23-0ded-4677-8336-76f533a9389e: "Take a look at this, shereen. You couldn't ask for a better spot to set a trap."
7d749cc3-d2f1-4953-b720-c40925cde01f: "Hmm. This will do for an ambush. Lord Captain, I advise you to post some of your people here."
ba221414-1ea8-47b4-b5d9-ad3b5efa9fe3: "The machine spirits of these sacred devices demand a rite of calibration. Once it is performed, they will be willing to serve you."
e0f83eb4-db86-4916-83c5-ad593847e96e: "That ventilation grille. It's a suitable place to wait for our guests to arrive."
